title: Heidi & Klara
description: In the long-awaited sequel to Mad Heidi, Heidi teams up with her childhood friend Klara and continues to take down the cheese fascists.
altHero: Heidi and Klara on a motrocycle with sidecar
alt1: cheese delivery truck driving over a dam bridge with mountains behind
alt2: Heidi and Klara facing down the truck
alt3: delivery truck driver wearing a milkman uniform
